snippet: Even with a settlement on the criminal claims, the company will still be subject to federal civil claims and claims for damages to natural resources.
abstract: Even with a settlement on the criminal claims, the company will still be subject to federal civil claims and claims for damages to natural resources.
lead_paragraph: BP has agreed to pay $4.5 billion in penalties to the United States government and plead guilty to 14 criminal charges related to the mammoth 2010 oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico. Clifford Krauss and Stanley Reed’s story is here.

headline.main: BP Settles Criminal Charges on Gulf Oil Spill
